summary: Two hitmen, one a novice and the other a veteran with poor luck, band together to find the "King of Killers" for whom there is a large reward.
cast: Jet Li|Eric Tsang|Simon Yam|Gigi Leung|Timmy Ho|Kwong-Kim Yip|John Ching|Keiji Sato|Hideri Meiken|Kenji Sahara|Paul Rapovski|Frankie Chi-Hung Ng|Ta Lei|Jude Poyer|Shing-Hung Leung|Kwai-Bo Chun|Sam Kai-Sen Huang|Dion Lam|Siu-Wah Chan|Cho-Kuen Chu|Yung-Chang Ho|Wai-Man Tam|Chi-Hung Ling|Tat Chiu Lee|Jack Wai-Leung Wong|Choi-Nam Yip|Foo-Wai Lam|Kim-Ban Wong|Shu-Kei Law|Tin-Bo Tam|Chi-Mun Ho|Wai Yin Tse|Chi-Hung Chan|Jim James|Ernst Mausser|Simon Cheung Yuk-San|Chi Wah Ling|Nunzio Caponio|Minori Ikarashi|Mika Kawanabe|Masako Enokimaru|Fukui Akihiro|Mitsuru Tokashiki|Kalo Hiroshi|Yu-Ning Lee|Chi-Wang Wong|Richard Epcar|Jessica Gee-George|Bing Lei Li|Michael Sorich
title: Rey de asesinos
